I just wanted to know how you feel about the Leftwing vs Rightwing. (IMO) I do not think one is better than the other. they both have major flaws. emoticon_xclown

Very few people are either, they are just very convenient, and unfortunate, labels.
 
 Waxy
Both parties are merely a fight over the spending of my money. I lean to the right but harly agree with the aggressive spending that either party demonstrates.

It gets even more complicated when you look outside US party politics and into other countries parties and definitions of left- and right- wing. And if you start analysing how left- and right- wing has changed over time it makes even less sense. I would however argue that it is still a useful simplification of the reality.

I believe there's a bell shaped curve within each group. Our main two parties have come to be tagged as wings. If you walk down the center aisle in the House, the left sits on the left, the right sits on the right. Unexplained is the absence of a fuselage.
The original reason for the terms left and right comes from the French national assembly before the revolution. With those who where more liberal sat on the left, and conservatives sat on the right.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Leftwing vs Rightwing
